reviewText: Just as the story started, the feature was over. This isn't a common mpleye mivie. Major waste of money. It also looks like it is meant to go along with other material where you stop and discuss with the kids. None of this was disclosed in the description.

This video is made for kids. It presents a fantasy that kids can really understand. The story revolves around kids who want to do better at dealing with bullies and violence. My kids got valuable life lessons in an entertaining way.
